name: Basic AMQ JMS Producer
helpText: Ending component of the flow, or a route in the flow. The JMS producer is based on Spring template and is used to connect to any Vendor specific JMS Broker(ActiveMQ, HornetQ, IBM MQ etc). However one need to include the related vendor specific libraries in the IM.

componentName.helpText: The name of the component as displayed on diagrams, space are encouraged, succinct is best. The name should be unique for the flow.

connectionFactoryJndiPropertyFactoryInit.helpText: The fully qualified class name of the factory class that will create the initial context. An initial context is the starting point for naming operations. For more information, see the Java API documentation for javax.naming.Context.INITIAL_CONTEXT_FACTORY.

connectionFactoryJndiPropertyProviderUrl.helpText: The configuration information for the service provider to use. The value should contain a URL string. For more information, see the Java API documentation for javax.naming.Context.PROVIDER_URL.

connectionFactoryName.helpText: ConnectionFactory|ConnectionFactoryName is required if not already passed on the constructor.

connectionFactoryPassword.helpText: Id set on the JMS connection for durable subscribers.

destinationJndiName.helpText: Destination(Topic/Queue) name, which could refer as well to JNDI name.

destinationJndiPropertyFactoryInitial.helpText: The fully qualified class name of the factory class that will create the initial context. An initial context is the starting point for naming operations. For more information, see the Java API documentation for javax.naming.Context.INITIAL_CONTEXT_FACTORY.

destinationJndiPropertyProviderUrl.helpText: The configuration information for the service provider to use. The value should contain a URL string. For more information, see the Java API documentation for javax.naming.Context.PROVIDER_URL.

destinationJndiPropertySecurityCredentia.helpText: The credentials of the principal for authenticating the caller to the service. For more information, see the Java API documentation for javax.naming.Context.SECURITY_CREDENTIALS.

destinationJndiPropertySecurityPrincipal.helpText: The identity of the principal for authenticating the caller to the service. For more information, see the Java API documentation for javax.naming.Context.SECURITY_PRINCIPAL.

pubSubDomain.helpText: Set to true to indicate that destination is a topic, otherwise destination is a queue.

sessionTransacted.helpText: Sets whether the session should be part of a transaction.
